title: Denzel Washington cuts a cool figure as he enjoys a night at the Los Angeles Lakers basketball game
text:
He is an acting legend who has two Academy Awards and two Golden Globes to his name.

And Denzel Washington enjoyed a break from his hectic film schedule as he took in a basketball game in Los Angeles on Tuesday.

The Training Day star, 64, showcased his on-trend style as he donned a New York Yankees snapback cap for the pre-season game between the Los Angeles Lakers and the Golden State Warriors.

Looking good: Denzel Washington enjoyed a break from his hectic film schedule as he took in a basketball game in Los Angeles on Tuesday

Good spirits: The Training Day star, 64, showcased his on-trend style as he donned a New York Yankees snapback cap for the pre-season game between the Los Angeles Lakers and the Golden State Warriors

The Bone Collector actor looked sharp for his evening for sports action, clad in a black tee and slate grey woolen jacket.

He paired this with black slacks and monochrome trainers.

The star looked delighted as he chatted with friends before taking his place courtside.

Handsome: The Bone Collector actor looked sharp for his evening for sports action, clad in a black tee and slate grey woolen jacket

Chatty: The star looked delighted as he chatted with friends before taking his place courtside

The star has been married to wife Pauletta Pearson since 1984. Back in June at the AFI Awards in Hollywood, the smitten star Washington said his 'biggest lifetime achievement' is his wife of 35 years.

The New York native met Pauletta on the set of the TV movie Wilma. They wed in 1983.

In 1995, Denzel and Pauletta renewed their wedding vows in South Africa with Archbishop Desmond Tutu officiating.

He added that he is also proud of his four children. He has John David, 34, Katia, 32, and 28-year-old twins Olivia and Malcolm with his spouse.

Banter: The Oscar winner looked happy as he relaxed with friends before the big game

When asked about his achievement, he was standing next to Pauletta. He said, '[Actually] I was pointing to her. That's my biggest lifetime achievement.'

The couple's children are also doing very well in their careers.

John is an actor who has appeared in the HBO comedy series Ballers and in Spike Lee's 2018 film BlacKkKlansman. He is also a former football player with the United Football League's Sacramento Mountain Lions.

Katia graduated from Yale University with a Bachelor Of Arts degree in 2010. Malcolm graduated from the University of Pennsylvania with a degree in film studies. Olivia played a role in Lee Daniels's film The Butler.
